      • editLineDistance

        public static double editLineDistance(Point3d[] line1,
                                      Point3d[] line2)
        Computes the distance between two lines in terms of edit operations necessary to move one line onto the other. This basically computes distances for beginning and end points of single lines and penalises non parallel lines .

      • linesParallel

        public static boolean linesParallel(Point3d line1Begin,
                                    Point3d line1End,
                                    Point3d line2Begin,
                                    Point3d line2End)
        Computes if two lines are parallel to each other, by checking the cross product of their direction vectors.
